job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWork with industry experts in combining the best of deep learning and semiconductor design to bring onedge machine learning to listening devicesppbrppThis will improve efficiency and improving privacy whilst lowering latency and saving bandwidth Moving away from inference and training that is dependent on cloud or legacy datacenters this company uses unique technology to accelerate toward processing on devicenbspppbrppAs the first implementation is on devices with listening capabilities the company is looking for a strong engineer with the ability to implement speech and audio algorithms in high quality seamless codenbspppbrppIf youre a passionate innovative engineer excited about the future of deep learning then this is for younbspppnbspppTo be considered youll needpulliPhD in a relevant technical fieldlili5 years as a strong technical contributor in speech andor audio processingliliA strong list of patents and publicationsliliExperience with DSP implementation and optimization of speech and audio algorithmsliliExperience with acoustic testing of speech and audio algorithmsdevicesliliExperience with machine learning deep learning audio processing speech processing speech recognition multimicrophone spatial processing acoustics echo cancellation singlechannel noise suppression acoustic testing source separation singlechannel noise suppression dereverberationliulpbrppbrppbrppemBig Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hireemp
